headline: Kinder Morgan (KMI) Valuation Check After Earnings Beat Dividend Hike And Credit Upgrade
summary: Kinder Morgan (KMI) is in focus after reporting better than expected fourth quarter earnings and revenue, highlighting record natural gas pipeline performance, a US$10b project backlog, a higher dividend, and a recent S&P credit rating upgrade. See our latest analysis for Kinder Morgan. The strong Q4 surprise, dividend increase and S&P upgrade have coincided with a clear shift in sentiment, with Kinder Morgan posting a 30 day share price return of 8.83% and a 90 day gain of 14.81%.
